<!-- BEGIN_AUTOGENERATED -->

# Lambda Node Formatting

Represents a lambda call using `->` (i.e. `-> {}`)

Note that `Lambda` is a part of the `Block`, not other way around.

<!-- END_AUTOGENERATED -->

## Formats and removes empty ()

Before:

```ruby
->() {}
```

After:

```ruby
-> {}
```

## Formats with arguments

Before:

```ruby
->(one) {}
```

After:

```ruby
->(one) {}
```
